Mission Focus

Large-scale solutions for today's warfighter

Blog Directions Contact

Mission Focus orchestrates technology and operations at a large scale to develop mission focused solutions for today’s warfighter. Mission Focus guides the customer toward a view of the problem domain as an Ultra-large Scale (ULS) system. Mission Focus’ continued research on “Big Data” solutions makes them experts within the Intelligence Community. Our purpose is to fulfill our customer’s missions.

    •

We are located in the National Community Pharmacists Association building on the fourth floor. Meter parking is available on the street in front of the building along Daingerfield Road, or in the public garage located across from the building entrance at 1700 Diagonal Road, Alexandria.
